general.gigTitle: develop construction company website using wordpress

sellerCard.description: It's me, Rakib Hasan. I am an expert freelancer and my working ground is based on web design. I can do anything related to my job. Also, I have a handful of experiences on this ground as I have been roaming here for around 2 long years. I am acquainted enough with the skills that your job demands and these are html5, css3, bootstrap, jQuery, Javascript, WordPress.

description.content:
㇣ It's me, Rakib Hasan. I am an expert freelancer and my working ground is based on web design. I can do anything related to my job. Also, I have a handful of experiences on this ground as I have been roaming here for around 2 long years of experience in designing  Construction websites with Elementor.


WHAT YOU'll GET IN WEBSITE DESIGN FEATURES :


㇣ Perfectly responsive construction website

㇣ Content Optimization for the construction website

㇣ Professional Looking construction site.

㇣ SEO Friendly Site Structure

㇣ Content upload 

㇣ Popups Form for a construction company

㇣ Construction company with Mailchimp Integration

㇣ Chatbot integration for a construction company

㇣ Custom design for the construction company

㇣ Fast loading 


WHY I WILL BE YOUR BEST CHOICE:


I am acquainted enough with the skills that your job demands and I just love doing my work and which is to make my clients happy by providing quality service.

Fast delivery after receiving the order.

㇣Note: I can also redesign your old construction website and support mobile-friendly.


For my WordPress Portfolio and work samples I designed, contact me.


Thanks

Rakib Hasan

WORDPRESS EXPERT

questionsAndAnswers.question: What i need to provide ?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: You need to provide: ✔Logo ✔Contents (Texts and Necessary Links) ✔Images (If you don’t have, then I can provide you with the best images related to your platform) ✔Hosting Credentials or WordPress Dashboard Access (don't worry it's safe) ✔Login Credentials ✔Any kind of website sample if possible

questionsAndAnswers.question: If i don't have hosting ?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Well, I have my own hosting and I will design your construction website at my hosting.

questionsAndAnswers.question: When you can start ?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: I can start immediately after placing the order.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Can you redesign old construction website?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Yes. I know, you love your old construction website. So I will keep the content the same, just make it mobile responsive and redesign your construction website as per your requirement.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Can you integrate chatting options?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Yes, I can integrate the chat option on your site and also the Messenger Chat option.

questionsAndAnswers.question: What do you mean by sections on the construction website?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Sections are the small part of a construction website. For example Header, Footer, About us e.t.c.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Still, I have questions about the gig ?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Please inbox me to know anything about me or my service.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Can you provide source files?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Yes, I can do it. I can also provide you with file backup and migration support.
